mapper.update: update reviewboard set rb_title=#{rb_title}, rb_content=#{rb_content}, rb_date=#{rb_date}, rb_orgimg=#{rb_orgimg}, rb_saveimg=#{rb_saveimg}, ol_num=#{ol_num}, p_num=#{p_num}, m_id=#{m_id}, where rb_num=#{rb_num}
mapper.select: select rb.rb_num, rb.m_id,rb.rb_title,rb.rb_content,rb_stars,rb_saveimg,rb.rb_date,g.g_name,c.c_colorname,sz.sz_sizename,rp.rp_content from reviewboard rb left outer join reviewreply rp on rb.rb_num= rp.rb_num, orders o,orderlist ol, gcs gcs,goods g,color c,sizes sz where rb.m_id = o.m_id and o.o_num=ol.o_num and ol.gcs_num=gcs.gcs_num and gcs.g_num =g.g_num and gcs.c_subnum = c.c_subnum and gcs.sz_ssubnum = sz.sz_ssubnum and g.g_num=#{g_num} order by rb.rb_date desc

select rb.rb_num,rb.m_id,rb.rb_title,rb.rb_content,rb_stars,rb_saveimg,rb.rb_date,g.g_name,c.c_colorname,sz.sz_sizename from reviewboard rb,orders o,orderlist ol, gcs gcs,goods g,color c,sizes sz where rb.m_id = o.m_id and o.o_num=ol.o_num and ol.gcs_num=gcs.gcs_num and gcs.g_num =g.g_num and gcs.c_subnum = c.c_subnum and gcs.sz_ssubnum = sz.sz_ssubnum and rb.rb_num = #{rb_num}

select * from ( select * from( select rownum rnum, rr.* from (select rb.*, rp.rb_num as replyCheck,rp_num,rp_content,g.g_name,c.c_colorname,sz.sz_sizename from reviewboard rb left join reviewreply rp on rb.rb_num = rp.rb_num, orders o,orderlist ol, gcs gcs,goods g,color c, sizes sz where rb.m_id = o.m_id and o.o_num=ol.o_num and ol.gcs_num=gcs.gcs_num and gcs.g_num =g.g_num and gcs.c_subnum = c.c_subnum and gcs.sz_ssubnum = sz.sz_ssubnum order by rb.rb_date desc) rr) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow})

select rb.*, rp.rb_num as replyCheck,rp_content,g.g_name,c.c_colorname,sz.sz_sizename from reviewboard rb left join reviewreply rp on rb.rb_num = rp.rb_num, orders o,orderlist ol, gcs gcs,goods g,color c, sizes sz where rb.m_id = o.m_id and o.o_num=ol.o_num and ol.gcs_num=gcs.gcs_num and gcs.g_num =g.g_num and gcs.c_subnum = c.c_subnum and gcs.sz_ssubnum = sz.sz_ssubnum and rp.rb_num =#{rb_num}
